front.title: •Emperor Palpatine, Foreseer
front.gametext: Never deploys or moves (even if carried) to a site opponent occupies. Once during your turn, may peek at the top three cards of your Reserve Deck; place one in Used Pile, one in Lost Pile, and take one into hand. Immune to attrition.
front.lore: From his throne room aboard the second Death Star, Emperor Palpatine monitors activity throughout the galaxy. Leader.

combo: Emperor Palpatine + I Have You Now Add one battle destiny (two if Rebel is Luke) if a Dark Jedi and a Rebel with ability > 2 are involved in the same battle.
Emperor Palpatine + Force Field Cancels an attempt to target a Dark Jedi with a character weapon.
